description: It crosses Junction Creek, passing by wetlands, and runs along the base of Adanac Ski Hill. part of the trail runs parallel to Junction Creek, where waterfowl may be seen and raspberries are ripe for picking in midsummer.Climb the hill and enjoy a majestic overview of the city. The trail continues through flat land and leads to Mountain Street, where it eventually meets the Junction Creek Trail.
directions: Rotary Park Trail commences off Beatrice Cres. near Adanac Ski Hill.
title: Rotary Park Trail
